snippet: Not including discontinued operations of its recently sold European business, Campbell said adjusted earnings were 76 cents a share, above the 73 cents a share Wall Street expected.
lead_paragraph: Not including discontinued operations of its recently sold European business, Campbell said adjusted earnings were 76 cents a share, above the 73 cents a share Wall Street expected.

headline.main: Campbell Soup Reports Increased Broth Sales
headline.print_headline: Campbell Soup Reports Increased Broth Sales
